extendedInfo.description: New and improved official Madani Channel Android application version 2.You can easily watch or listen Madani Channel programs such as Tilawat, Hamd, Naat, Kalams, Madani Muzakrah, Madani Phool, Madani News etc.Designed and Developed by:I.T. Department of Dawat-e-Islami

reviews.title: Superb Work !!!
reviews.comment: Excellent application, i will gv 10/10.  \"Allah Karam Aisa Kare Tujh Pe Jahan Me Aye Dawat-E-Islami Teri Dhoom Machi Ho\".
reviews.author: Md Waseem Javed

reviews.title: Fantastic
reviews.comment: Thanks too it department. Realy need of this app. May Allah bless all madni channel team.
reviews.author: Zeeshan Anwar

reviews.title: Noir A2
reviews.comment: Exellent work by Dawat e Islami  Allah karam aexa kare tjh pe jahan me  Ae Dawat e Islami teri dhum machi ho  Mst download this <3<3<3 Thanks to it majlis of Dawat e Islami
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Excellent, Fabulous, Wonderful and what not!!!!
reviews.comment: Cant describe the joy and happiness i felt when saw this application... Idea of keeping different channels within application was REALLY great. May Allah Sub\'hanahuWaTa\'aala give Jaza-e-Khair to developers.
reviews.author: Abdul Razak

reviews.title: Streaming not smooth..
reviews.comment: Very genuine attempt by dawate Islami, but streaming is not smooth voice continuously breaks & is difficult to understand what the programs. So please fix the same.
reviews.author: shahnawaz khan

reviews.title: MashaAllah.... JazakAallah
reviews.comment: Great App..... May Allah reward you
reviews.author: Syed Shakeel Ahmed

reviews.title: Adorable
reviews.comment: This is beautiful and blessed full madani gift from America AhleSunnat, damage barakatuhumul Aaliya

reviews.title: Nice application
reviews.comment: Nice work end easy to use.
reviews.author: Shahbaz Ahmed

reviews.title: Great Improvement!!!
reviews.comment: It\'s nice to see that now we can watch and listen Madani Channel Transmission through this app even if the screen is off. Moreover the online Radios are awesome. Now we can listen Quran, Naats and Farz Uloom Speeches on the go. Thanks a lot for the great achievement...
reviews.author: Muhammed Hassan Raza Attari

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: Allah hum sub ko dekhne samjhne aur amal krne ki tofiq de aameem
reviews.author: Mali All

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: MashaAllah I was looking for this app to watch or listen madani channel. May Allah give more success to IT department of Madani channel.
reviews.author: Zahoor Ahmad
